word.val: Please, fill in all the fields
A backup with the same name exists in the logs folder
A backup with the same name exists in the list
The selected backups have been launched
The extension has been successfully added
The extension is already in the list
The business software has been successfully added
The business software is already in the list
The maximum transfer size must be an integer (kb)
The maximum transfer size has been changed
Finished or stopped backups have been deleted
The selected backups have been deleted
Source and target folders are the same
Target and mirror folders are the same
A backup with the same source folder is already present in the list
A backup with the same target folder is already present in the list
The source folder is the same as the target folder of a backup already in the list
The target folder is the same as the source folder of a backup already in the list
This mirror folder is the same as the target folder of a backup already in the list
The target folder is the same as the mirror folder of a backup already in the list
The extensions to be encrypted, priority extensions and business software are specific to each backup. Please add them before adding a backup to the launch list.
